message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it's worth $15000 to you. Please let us know if this aligns with your expectations.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you're placing on the product, but I think we can find common ground. I am willing to pay $14000 for the product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your position and would like to come closer to your offer. Our counteroffer is $14500 for the product. We hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I am able to consider a price of $14200 for the product.
Considering your latest offer, Alice has decided to counter with a price of $14300 for the product. We hope this brings us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.
Thank you for your continued negotiation, Alice. I am willing to pay $14100 for the product.
After thoughtful consideration, Alice has decided to counter with a price of $14250 for the product. We hope this brings us closer to a satisfactory agreement for both parties.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am willing to pay $14150 for the product.
After careful consideration, Alice has decided to counter with a price of $14200 for the product. We hope this brings us closer to a mutually agreeable solution.
